title: Drawing, "Fantastic Landscape", 1957
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and black and gray wash on white watercolor paper, mounted
signed: Lower right: in pen and black ink: signature (Chinese calligraphy) and date
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Wiesenberger
description: Fantastic figures in a landscape, rendered in spindly, shakey lines. Areas of wash are overlayed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fantastic Landscape", 1957.
1957. Pen and black ink, brush and black and gray wash on white watercolor paper, mounted. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Arthur Wiesenberger. 1967-66-75.
